REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f9408 reute h f BC-TOTAL-HEALTH-<TLHT>-I 03-18 0043

TEXT.TITLE: TOTAL HEALTH <TLHT> IN PUBLIC OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Total Health Systems Inc said it began a sale of up to 700,000 common shares by the company and up to 410,000 shares by certain stockholders. Proceeds will be used for general purposes. Reuter
